member.name: P:LightCore.Configuration.Properties.Resources.ActiveRegistrationGroupNotFoundFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Active registration group with name '{0}' was not found. Maybe its the case sensitivity..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Bad stream content, empty or malformed not found..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Xml configuration file not found. Path: '{0}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Contract type for following registration cannot be empty. Registration: '{0}'..

member.name: P:LightCore.Configuration.Properties.Resources.CouldNotLoadTypeFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not load type: '{0}', maybe wrong full qualified info. Try e.g.: "Namespace.Type, Assembly". Or check bin folder and copy DLLs if necessary..

member.name: P:LightCore.Configuration.Properties.Resources.ImplementationTypeCannotBeEmptyFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Implementation type for following registration cannot be empty. Registration: '{0}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Configuration section '{0}' not found..
